How to prevent Parasites - Angiostrongyliasis (also known as Angiostrongylus Infection) ?,"Angiostrongylus cantonensis
    
Prevention of A. cantonensis infections involves educating persons residing in or traveling to areas where the parasite is found about not ingesting raw or undercoo
